name: Golf Ball Shot Experts
description:
Golf Ball Shot Experts is a mini golf paradise with incredible 3D effects that keeps youplaying,as more content and functions are added each month. Let the golf ball run in the right way and make the ultimate winner. Carefully and find creative ways to putt your ball in the hole before you are out of shots. Master funny challenging game obstacles and dynamic objects such as jumps, spinning bars, slopes, holes, and loops.
Feature:
- Relax and take aim in Classic mode.
- Race ahead in fast & furious Rush mode.
- Simple, intuitive controls. Fun, addicting gameplay.
- Awesome 3d graphics.
- Win prizes & powerful golf gear.
- Level up , courses and levels.
